post:
VPSB,

 

I want to welcome everyone to our GRAND OPENING offer thread! I plan to offer a wide variety of services and locations Worldwide.

 

To start I have chosen Dallas, TX to premier our services. Dallas, TX is a centralized location that is often forgotten about due to Chicago, IL. The bandwidth blend in Dallas is a mix of the following providers: Level3, AboveNet, nLayer and BBOI.

 

After a few days I also have decided to open Los Angeles, CA This is directly inside of Quadranet and is on Asia Optimized IPs. We also have NATIVE IPv6 here as well.

 

A Little bit about the hardware we use. All of our servers will be E3 or E5 Intel Processors with at least 32GB of DDR3 Memory. Disks will be in a Raid 10 array. Network connectivity will be delivered via Gigabit ports. Our Nodes are monitored 247365 by monitoring software to make sure everyone stays online.

 

Without further ado I give you Hostress.net: Feeding your hosting needs one package at a time.

 

Below you will find the grand opening specials, order links, and testing information.
